name: Cs505-computational-tools-for-data-science
tagline: Repository for CS 505 as taught Fall 2016 in BU Computer Science
body:
### Welcome to CS 505, Computational Tools for Data Science

Meeting Place: SCI 117

Meeting Time: TR 11-12:30

Instructor: Prof. Mark Crovella
* Office: MCS 140E
* Office Hours: M 2-3:30, R 3-4:30
* email: crovella@bu.edu

Teaching Fellow: Ms. Katherine Missimer
* Office:
* Office Hours:
* Lab Tutoring Hours:
* email: kzhao@bu.edu

This course will introduce you to a wide variety of methods for data analysis. More details are in the syllabus.

Course details, including readings, grading, and lecture schedule are in the syllabus, which is [here.](https://github.com/mcrovella/CS505-Computational-Tools-for-Data-Science/blob/master/syllabus.pdf)

Lecture materials (in the form of jupyter notebooks, as well as PDF versions) are [here,](https://github.com/mcrovella/CS505-Computational-Tools-for-Data-Science) or can be downloaded en masse from the links above. These will be updated as the semester progresses.

Online discussion takes place on Piazza. The link for our class's Piazza discussion is here.(TBD)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
